special_powers.description: At the beginning of your turn, if Firestorm has no action tokens, you may roll 1d6. If you roll 1-3, Firestorm can use Penetrating/Psychic Blast. If you roll 4-6, Firestorm can use Perplex. He can use that power until he begins your turn with no action tokens.
Orange squares are Fallen Cosmic Object squares. Objects placed in one of these squares can't be picked up, moved, or destroyed.
